scenes.text:
Cardiff University Tennis Club (CUTC) is one of the largest and most active clubs at Cardiff University, boasting over 250 members and eight BUCS teams. After the disruptions caused by COVID-19, we are back and more enthusiastic than ever!

Our Social Tennis is open to players of all abilities. Whether you’re an experienced player or have never picked up a racket before, you are welcome!

Cardiff University is gaining recognition as a high-performance tennis university. Our team ethos emphasizes inclusivity, with squad training sessions and weekly team allocations. Our fixtures are held at the House of Sport, Ocean Park Arena, and Heath Park.

We have social tennis sessions every Wednesday and Sunday, as well as lessons being available on Wednesday. 

All social tennis activities take place at Cardiff Lawn Tennis Club, centrally located near Cardiff Castle. The club features 11 courts (4 acrylic, 4 hard courts, and 3 artificial clay courts) and has excellent facilities, including a clubhouse with a bar and hot food, stringing services, and affordable rackets.

We also arrange Social/Development team matches against Cardiff Met a few times each term for those interested in competitive play.

For updates and extra information about team structure and schedule visit our webpage!

We offer two types of memberships:

Team Membership: £170.00
Social Membership: £60.00

These memberships provide access to our sessions, socials and general society events!

Wednesday night socials are a hallmark of CUTC, bringing together both social and team members. We host themed events and non-alcoholic activities, making our socials inclusive for all. Our first "tennis whites" social had over 110 attendees! We also utilize Bute Park for controlled society meet-ups.
